alert.note: Alert for Vernon (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 07 at 2:12PM CDT until April 10 at 7:45AM CDT by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO MONDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Bayou Anacoco Near Rosepine. * WHEN...From late tonight to Monday morning. * IMPACTS...At 20.0 feet, Hawks Road near the gauge becomes flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:45 AM CDT Friday the stage was 11.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight to a crest of 18.7 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (1 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Sat Sun Mon Bayou Anacoco Rosepine 17.0 11.8 Fri 10 am CD 18.3 17.8 14.5 &&
